summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1758, for the improvement of Nineteenth Avenue Northwest, from West Sixty-fifth Street to West Seventy-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 18657 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
